section.title: Meet Charlie Bucket
section.p: The main character of the story is Charlie Bucket.
He is a poor young boy who lives in a small, cramped house with his parents and grandparents, since this is all they can afford.

He passes by Willy Wonka’s chocolate factory every day and wishes he could visit it, but he’s never seen anyone go in or out of the factory. Even though the factory looks empty, Charlie’s Grandpa Joe tells him fascinating stories of the famed Willy Wonka and the delicious sweets he invented.
